svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - February 12 2022

title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 12, 2022" date: "2022-02-12"
Eth News and Links
Proof of Stake consensus layer
‚Ä¢ PoS implementers call video . Notes from Ben Edgington : Public Kiln testnet to be setup once
sufficient milestones hit Vitalik‚Äôs blob transactions more complex version favored to lessen work on
execution layer; to be prototyped at EthDenver
‚Ä¢ Public Kiln testnet to be setup once sufficient milestones hit
‚Ä¢ Vitalik‚Äôs blob transactions more complex version favored to lessen work on execution layer; to be
prototyped at EthDenver
‚Ä¢ Latest What‚Äôs New in Eth2
‚Ä¢ Lighthouse v2.1.3 : improves peer stability using fork of rust-libp2p
PoW switch off
‚Ä¢ Kiln milestone tracker (pre-production sprint for PoW switch off) Kiln will be last testnet before
existing public testnets like Goerli are upgraded
‚Ä¢ Kiln will be last testnet before existing public testnets like Goerli are upgraded
‚Ä¢ Not many unchecked boxes remain in PoW switch off readiness checklist
‚Ä¢ Draft EIP to add beacon state roots into the EVM for beacon chain withdrawals, aiming for Shanghai
upgrade after PoW switch off
‚Ä¢ Client diversity risk scenarios : 3-4 weeks to resolve a consensus bug in a client with half the ETH
staked, compared with 13 minutes for a client with 67% or more ETH staked; examples of past attacks
and bugs
‚Ä¢ Community call #3 video
‚Ä¢ Kintsugi testnet PnP image for Raspberry Pi
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIP4788 : Beacon state root in the EVM
‚Ä¢ EIP4786 : Link Common Token to ERC721
‚Ä¢ EIP4742 : NONCE opcode
Layer2
‚Ä¢ L2 Fees : adds fees paid to Layer 1 by Layer 2s for security
‚Ä¢ FTX supports Arbitrum
‚Ä¢ Argent zkSync wallet deposits from exchanges via LayerSwap
‚Ä¢ Proof of Efficiency : Polygon Hermez consensus proposal for zk-rollups
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Starbloom Ventures!
Starbloom Ventures is an early-stage venture fund by Evan Van Ness to invest in the future of web3.
We believe that the Ethereum ecosystem should have a cultural norm that VCs help fund public goods,
that‚Äôs why we pledge 10% of profits to support Ethereum public goods .
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ OpenZeppelin Contracts v4.5.0 : Base64 encoding, NFT royalties, NFT voting, governance minimum
voting duration and ERC20 infinite approval
‚Ä¢ Underhanded Solidity Contest : build a DEX with unexpected trades
‚Ä¢ Solidity developer survey 2021 results
‚Ä¢ Feedback wanted on support for catching Solidity custom errors
‚Ä¢ Nomic Foundation : non-profit public goods organization building Hardhat, Rethnet & Slang ; $15m of
$30m already raised
‚Ä¢ Forge: guide to forking mainnet/testnets in tests
‚Ä¢ Use Forge Standard Library to set token balances for an address
‚Ä¢ Incentivize bots to call your contract : pay in ETH/WETH, no inputs, no bond/registration, no unsafe
external calls & only call when meaningful
‚Ä¢ Slither Action : run Slither static analyzer in GitHub Actions workflow
‚Ä¢ Yield‚Äôs approach to calculating prices from oracles
‚Ä¢ Token Gate : TypeScript module for ERC20/721/777/1155 balance gating
‚Ä¢ Flashbots Proxy : interactively compose and submit Flashbots bundles
‚Ä¢ Choosing which wallets to support for projects on Layer 2
‚Ä¢ StarkNet React : React hooks using starknet.js
‚Ä¢ Full-stack guide to Starknet using Nile, Starknet.py and cairopal
‚Ä¢ circom-ecdsa : proof of concept zkSNARK circuits for ECDSA in circom
‚Ä¢ EVM symbolic execution engine in Solidity with a Difference Logic solver, for study purposes only
‚Ä¢ Guide to web3 data for web2 data analysts
Security
‚Ä¢ Optimism critical vulnerability disclosed , self destruct created additional ETH, Optimism & forks
fixed, $2 million bounty paid to saurik
‚Ä¢ Dego Finance ~$10 million exploit , reportedly compromised keys
‚Ä¢ Tecra $639k exploit , logic error in token burn, Uniswap v2 pool drained
‚Ä¢ Yearn vulnerability disclosed , SingleSidedBalancer strategy could be attacked, $200k bounty paid
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ Polynya: how Ethereum scales , first with rollups, then EIP4488 or blob transactions, followed by
danksharding and finally statelessness & zk EVM
‚Ä¢ Ethereum ecosystem $585 billion total market cap in January; $310B Ether, $240B ERC20s, $25B
synthetic assets and $9B NFTs
‚Ä¢ Vitalik: why Ethereum chose 12 second block times for PoS
Enterprise
‚Ä¢ OnlyFans adds NFT profile pics
‚Ä¢ Ubisoft‚Äôs Rabbids to be used in the Sandbox
Application layer
‚Ä¢ Maker crosses 10 billion DAI
‚Ä¢ BarnBridge SMART Alpha live on Optimism, new 1-day pools
‚Ä¢ Set Protocol integrates Perpetual Protocol v2 on Optimism
‚Ä¢ Aboard Exchange (order book derivatives exchange) live on Arbitrum
‚Ä¢ Vesta Finance live on Arbitrum
‚Ä¢ Element Finance Voting Vaults : assign voting power to any contributor or value, such as locked
positions
‚Ä¢ Mirror midwit : generate contract UI in a document, alpha, supports mainnet, Arbitrum & Optimism
‚Ä¢ briq alpha 1.0 (building blocks to create NFTs on StarkNet): redesigned as semi-fungible tokens,
resizable canvas, claim 1000 briqs
‚Ä¢ Looksmutable : analyze mutability of NFT metadata by ENS or OpenSea link
‚Ä¢ RAC.fm : web3 enabled music portal for RAC holders
‚Ä¢ Gummy : link a physical object to an NFT using a verifiable anti-counterfeit sticker, available for
beta testers
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ Roles at Gnosis Sr DevRel Eng. Sr Production/Reliability Eng. DevOps Eng.
‚Ä¢ Nomic Foundation hiring Rust Tech Lead & Ethereum Tech Lead
‚Ä¢ Re7 Capital ‚Äì a DeFi yield fund ‚Äì is hiring analysts and data engineers
‚Ä¢ Wanna build a cutting edge ETH Staking pipeline? üÖê‚Ñô‚ìÖüÑª ∏ for Ether Capital
‚Ä¢ Senior Technical Writer to take ownership & completely redo the Geth docs
‚Ä¢ EF research hiring Networking Engineer
‚Ä¢ Internship program with Nethermind (1-3 month)
Reach developers experienced with Ethereum.¬† $600 for four issues (~75 character limit), payable in
ETH/DAI/USDC to abcoathup.eth on mainnet, Arbitrum or Optimism.¬† Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ KPMG Canada adds Ether to balance sheet , along with carbon offsets
‚Ä¢ RAC: why NFTs matter to artists
‚Ä¢ BlackRock plans to offer crypto trading
General
‚Ä¢ Couple arrested in relation to Bitfinex 2016 hack for alleged conspiracy to launder $4.5 billion in
Bitcoin
‚Ä¢ Binance $200m investment in Forbes
‚Ä¢ US Senator reveals secret CIA bulk data collection without oversight
‚Ä¢ Proposal for trustless BTC bridge creation with witness encryption
‚Ä¢ SHA256 : visually step through the algorithm
‚Ä¢ Least Authority discloses security vulnerabilities in Atomic Wallet
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @evan_van_ness and
@abcoathup to get most of the week‚Äôs news in real time.
Permalink for this week‚Äôs issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-february-12-2022
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note (new/changes in bold ) :
‚Ä¢ Feb 17 ‚Äì Schelling Point (Denver)
‚Ä¢ Feb 18-20 ‚Äì ETHDenver
‚Ä¢ Feb 23 ‚Äì Mar 11 ‚Äì Codeless Conduct no-code hackathon (virtual)
‚Ä¢ Mar 9-24 ‚Äì Gitcoin Grants Round 13
‚Ä¢ Mar 11-20 ‚Äì Ethereum Rio
‚Ä¢ Mar 15 ‚Äì Cryptocurrency Class starts (virtual)
‚Ä¢ Mar 16 ‚Äì submission deadline for Underhanded Solidity Contest
‚Ä¢ Mar 17-18 ‚Äì ETH Austin summit
‚Ä¢ Mar 29-31 ‚Äì ETHDubai
‚Ä¢ Apr 7-9 ‚Äì ETH Portland hackathon
‚Ä¢ Apr 18-25 ‚Äì Devconnect (Amsterdam)
‚Ä¢ Apr 22-24 ‚Äì ETHAmsterdam
‚Ä¢ May 3-8 ‚Äì spaghettETH (Milan)
‚Ä¢ May 20 ‚Äì US Fed CBDC discussion paper feedback deadline
‚Ä¢ Jun 10-12 ‚Äì ETHPrague
‚Ä¢ Jun 20-23 ‚Äì NFT.NYC
‚Ä¢ Jun 24-26 ‚Äì ETHNewYork
‚Ä¢ Jul 8 ‚Äì ETH Seattle summit
‚Ä¢ Jul 19-21 ‚Äì EthCC 5 (Paris)
‚Ä¢ Aug 19-21 ‚Äì ETHMexicoCity
‚Ä¢ Aug 27-28 ‚Äì DeFi Security Summit (Stanford)
‚Ä¢ Aug 29-31 ‚Äì Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford)
‚Ä¢ Nov 4-6 ‚Äì ETHSanFrancisco
‚Ä¢ Dec 2-4 ‚Äì ETHTaipei
